review: I changed my mind about this, as it stops working all the time during movies on Netflix (it's not my wifi or Netflix that's the problem, because when I switch over to the app for Netflix on my smart TV, it doesn't happen). Also, it stops working while playing music using the Amazon Music app installed on it. Very frustrating, because if it actually was reliable, then it would be great, because it is much more intuitive than using the remote for my smart tv and it has many more apps too. But unfortunately I rarely use it anymore because it freezes or stops working all the time, every time I try to use it. I read that you can re-start, etc. but to have to do that every time I use it defeats the purpose of using it. Too bad.

review: I got a fire stick along with the fire TV so we could stream on other TV's, now I wonder if that was a good idea? There was very little info regarding how streaming works, especially when it keeps showing a "buy it" box for everything I try to watch. I ended up getting a kindle book to help me understand this device and how it works better. If you aren't computer savvy this is not as easy as they claim.
